price: Kandi (yewe Muhamadi) ibyo twaguhishuriye mu gitabo (Qur’an) ni ko kuri gushimangira ibyahishuwe mbere yabyo. Mu by’ukuri Allah ni Umumenyi wa byose, Ubona bihebuje abagaragu be.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ مِنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ لَخَبِيرُۢ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhī awḥaynā ilayka mina al-kitābi huwa al-ḥaqu muṣaddiqan limā bayna yadayhi inna al-laha biʿibādihi lakhabīrun baṣīrun
